short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates all text on the page from VMTurbo to Turbonomic to reflect the name change for the company.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In light of the renaming of VMTurbo to Turbonomic on Wednesday August 17, 2016, this lets your browser save you the translation time.  Every time VMTurbo is on screen in text, it will render as Turbonomic.  

See here for the announcement: http://discoposse.com/2016/08/17/the-turbonomic-journey-starts-now/
